name: Super DynoStory
description:
A hilarious, weird and fun metroidvania with silly interactive cut scenes that force you to think outside the box!

The EVIL Pallid has stolen your gold! Shoot, Jet Pack and Bird? your way across colourful and dangerous worlds to stop his evil plan and get revenge!

Battle 8 Peculiar Bosses! Spoilers: It's Megasluggy, Pooch the Furry, Levaduck, Princess Obly, The Obapreed Brain, Evil Santa and Pallid himself, The villainous spook. Not to mention the secret boss!

Get Upto 14 Achievements such as speed-running the game in 60 minutes, beating the game on Impossible Mode or killing "Mr Falco" at the office!

credits

Featuring the voices of PallidCrest as Pallid and Yoloswagstudios as Pooch.
